name: agentops-marketplace
description: AgentOps Marketplace - Vibe Coding ecosystem plugins for Claude Code with modular architecture

plugins.name: foundation-core
plugins.description: Core RPI workflow (Research/Plan/Implement), session management, and vibe-coding metrics

plugins.name: foundation-bundles
plugins.description: Context persistence and bundle management for multi-session work

plugins.name: foundation-quality
plugins.description: Code review, testing, and architecture analysis

plugins.name: foundation-learning
plugins.description: Pattern extraction, retrospectives, and knowledge maintenance

plugins.name: foundation-meta
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration, context management, and AI engineering

plugins.name: foundation-skills
plugins.description: Domain knowledge packs for GitOps, infrastructure, security, and platform engineering

plugins.name: domain-software-engineer
plugins.description: Full-stack development: frontend, backend, APIs, UI/UX

plugins.name: domain-devops
plugins.description: CI/CD, containers, deployments, pipelines, networking

plugins.name: domain-platform
plugins.description: GitOps, Crossplane, Kyverno, databases, monitoring, platform services

plugins.name: domain-data
plugins.description: Data engineering, analytics, machine learning, and MLOps

plugins.name: domain-security
plugins.description: Security scanning, penetration testing, incident response

plugins.name: domain-documentation
plugins.description: Documentation creation, optimization, diagrams, Diataxis compliance

plugins.name: domain-mobile
plugins.description: iOS, Android, and cross-platform mobile development

plugins.name: domain-innovation
plugins.description: Architecture review, automation discovery, brainstorming, capability exploration

plugins.name: specialist-golang
plugins.description: Idiomatic Go: goroutines, channels, interfaces, error handling

plugins.name: specialist-python
plugins.description: Advanced Python: decorators, generators, async, testing

plugins.name: specialist-typescript
plugins.description: Advanced TypeScript: type system, generics, strict typing

plugins.name: specialist-shell
plugins.description: Shell scripting: POSIX compliance, automation, system integration

plugins.name: specialist-rust
plugins.description: Rust systems programming: ownership, lifetimes, async, performance

plugins.name: specialist-java
plugins.description: Java/Spring development: Spring Boot, JVM, enterprise patterns

plugins.name: specialist-performance
plugins.description: Performance testing, profiling, and optimization

plugins.name: specialist-accessibility
plugins.description: Web accessibility, WCAG compliance, and inclusive design
